xpm.name: XPM
xpm.description: A stoic, weathered survivor tasked with carrying the last fragment of a fallen star through a predatory forest. He is a man of heavy, rhythmic movements, driven by a primal instinct for duty despite the parasitic nature of his mission.
xpm.appearance: Height: 6'2", body and head shape resembles a LEGO minifigure or Roblox character. Skin: Pale, frost-scarred flesh (#E0E4E8) with silver-nitrate branding on the collarbone. Hair: Shaved close to the scalp, peppered grey (#808080). Eyes: Permanently stained a pale, glowing violet (#9370DB). Facial features: Sunken cheeks, a jagged scar running from his brow to his jawline, and lips parched by the freezing air. Clothing: A heavy, hooded cloak of 'Grave-Wool' in deep charcoal (#2F2F2F) that absorbs light; beneath it, rusted iron-plate pauldrons and leather bindings in dark umber (#4B3621). Accessories: A cracked glass lantern containing the Solemn Ember, and a Cinder-Staff made of petrified wood.
xpm.role: Protagonist and bearer of the Solemn Ember.

jack.name: Jack
jack.description: A youth whose spirit is tethered to the physical world to serve as a navigator and scout. He is jittery and hyper-perceptive, able to hear the forest's movements through its iron-bark trees.
jack.appearance: Height: 5'0", wiry and slight frame with a body and head shape resembling a LEGO minifigure or Roblox character. Skin: Texture of charred parchment with a warm, copper undertone (#A0522D). Hair: A crown of soft, flickering orange embers (#FF4500) that shed a constant, faint light. Eyes: Bright, reflective gold (#FFD700) with no visible pupils. Facial features: Sharp, youthful features with a permanent expression of alert anxiety. Clothing: A tattered tunic of woven Silver-Thistle fibers in pale ash-grey (#B2BEB5) and fingerless gloves. Accessories: A leather Filter-Satchel (#5C4033) containing various stained-glass lenses.
jack.role: Companion, navigator, and secondary light source.

the_great_stillness.name: The Great Stillness
the_great_stillness.description: An ancient, red eyed entity that resembles a bipedal stag representing the forest's desire for eternal frost and silence. It stalks the protagonists, manifesting as a terrifying bipedal predator that consumes heat and sound. The stag fears light, so shining light sources on him will cause him to retreat into the shadows.
the_great_stillness.appearance: Height: 15'0" when standing bipedally. Skin: Pale, leathery hide stretched over a skeletal frame. Head: A bleached prehistoric elk skull (#F5F5DC) with sprawling, bone-white antlers. Eyes: Red, glowing eyes. Limbs: Elongated hind legs with joints that snap like ice; forelimbs ending in three-foot obsidian 'Scythe-Talons' (#0A0A0A) dripping with silver mercury. Mouth: A 'Void-Gullet'â€”a jaw that hangs unhinged to reveal a throat of absolute, light-consuming blackness (#000000).
the_great_stillness.role: Primary Antagonist and guardian of the Obsidian Weald.

the_obsidian_weald.name: The Obsidian Weald
the_obsidian_weald.description: A sentient, breathing forest where the sun is dead and the flora pulses in time with a traveler's heartbeat. It is a place of permanent twilight where geometry fractures and memories are used as currency.
the_obsidian_weald.visual_details: Architecture/Landscape: Iron-barked trees with scales of rusted iron (#8B4513) and bioluminescent fungi. Colors: Dominant violet twilight (#483D8B), deep indigo shadows (#191970), and neon cyan bioluminescence (#00FFFF). Lighting: Dim, pulsing glows from 'Eye-Stalks' and 'Lure-Lichen.' Textures: Metallic bark, soft 'Whisper-Moss' (#2E8B57), and crystalline frost. Atmosphere: Thick, metallic fog known as 'Iron Breath' (#708090). Time: Permanent night, divided by lunar intensity.

the_hollow_cairn.name: The Hollow-Cairn
the_hollow_cairn.description: A temporary sanctuary for the Wick-Keeper, centered around a volcanic Hearth-Stone. It provides a brief respite from the predatory shadows of the Weald.
the_hollow_cairn.visual_details: Architecture/Landscape: A natural depression shielded by the massive, calcified ribs of ancient leviathans (#DCDCDC). Features: A central 'Hearth-Stone' made of jagged volcanic glass (#1A1A1B) etched with golden glowing runes (#FFD700). Firepit: A 'Cradle of Soot' where the Solemn Ember flows like liquid gold. Atmospheric elements: Spirit-Chimes made of finger-bones hanging from surrounding briars. Lighting: Warm, flickering amber (#FFBF00) against the cold violet of the forest background.

solemn_ember.name: Solemn Ember
solemn_ember.description: The last fragment of a fallen star, housed in a cracked glass lantern. It is the only source of warmth and survival in the Weald.
solemn_ember.appearance: A jagged, pulsating core of white-hot plasma (#FFFFFF) with an outer corona of deep orange (#FF4500), contained within a frame of tarnished brass and cracked lead-glass.

whisper_moss.name: Whisper-Moss
whisper_moss.description: A sentient ground cover that records and plays back the sounds of previous travelers to confuse the current ones.
whisper_moss.appearance: A thick, velvety carpet of iridescent teal and deep green moss (#008080) that glows faintly when stepped upon, releasing small spores of silver light (#C0C0C0).

memory_shards.name: Memory Shards
memory_shards.description: Crystalline fragments of the protagonist's past, used as fuel for the Solemn Ember during the final stages of the journey.
memory_shards.appearance: Jagged, translucent crystals (#E6E6FA) that display moving, holographic images of faces, homes, and sunlight when held close to the lantern.

cinder_staff.name: Cinder-Staff
cinder_staff.description: A polearm made of petrified wood used to test the density of moss and ward off minor sprites.
cinder_staff.appearance: A six-foot staff of blackened, petrified wood (#333333) wrapped in silver-thistle twine, with a glowing ember tip that never fully extinguishes.

style.description: A dark, atmospheric fusion of Gothic Horror and Ethereal Fantasy, characterized by high-contrast lighting and bioluminescent accents.
style.typeface: Weathered, hand-pressed serif with runic flourishes and irregular kerning.
style.inking: Intricate, scratchy linework with heavy cross-hatching to emphasize the textures of iron-bark and grave-wool.
style.coloring: A restricted palette of cold violets and greys contrasted sharply against warm, liquid-looking oranges and cyans.
style.line_width: Variable; fine and sharp for the environment, thick and heavy for the silhouettes of the protagonists.
style.palette: Obsidian Black (#050505), Violet Twilight (#483D8B), Ember Orange (#FF4500), Iron Grey (#43464B), and Bioluminescent Cyan (#00FFFF).
style.shading: Dramatic chiaroscuro with soft, glowing gradients emanating from light sources.
style.texture: Heavy use of organic textures: rusted metal, calcified bone, damp moss, and cracked glass.
